trans-unit.source: Workstation Data Recovery

seg-source.mrk: Workstation Data Recovery

target.mrk: Récupération des données d’un poste de travail

trans-unit.source: To recover workstation data, you need to:

seg-source.mrk: To recover workstation data, you need to:

target.mrk: Pour récupérer les données d’un poste de travail, vous devez :

trans-unit.source: Set up the BMR with the workstation information.

seg-source.mrk: Set up the BMR with the workstation information.

target.mrk: Paramétrer le BMR avec les informations du poste de travail.

trans-unit.source: Choose the data to restore.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the data to restore.

target.mrk: Sélectionner les données à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Bare Metal Recovery Configuration

seg-source.mrk: Bare Metal Recovery Configuration

target.mrk: Configuration du Bare Metal Recovery

trans-unit.source: To set up the BMR

seg-source.mrk: To set up the BMR

target.mrk: Configurer le BMR

trans-unit.source: Boot the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> BMR disk or the ISO image delivered with the product.

seg-source.mrk: Boot the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> BMR disk or the ISO image delivered with the product.

target.mrk: Démarrez le disque Atempo <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> BMR ou lancez l’image ISO fournie avec le produit.

trans-unit.source: Select the Keyboard to use.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Keyboard to use.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le clavier à utiliser.

trans-unit.source: Select the Timezone.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Timezone.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le fuseau horaire.

trans-unit.source: The timezone selection ensures you match with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> settings for instances analysis.

seg-source.mrk: The timezone selection ensures you match with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> settings for instances analysis.

target.mrk: La sélection du fuseau horaire garantit une cohérence avec les paramètres <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pour l'analyse des instances.

trans-unit.source: The Welcome screen displays:

seg-source.mrk: The Welcome screen displays:

target.mrk: L’écran d’accueil s’affiche :

trans-unit.source: These icons are available from the Welcome screen:

seg-source.mrk: These icons are available from the Welcome screen:

target.mrk: Ces icônes sont disponibles à partir de l’écran d’accueil ;

trans-unit.source: Icon

seg-source.mrk: Icon

target.mrk: Icône

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Opens the Task Manager

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Task Manager

target.mrk: Ouvre le gestionnaire de tâches

trans-unit.source: Opens the Configuration Tool for the network card

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Configuration Tool for the network card

target.mrk: Ouvre l'outil de configuration pour la carte réseau

trans-unit.source: Opens the Command window

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Command window

target.mrk: Ouvre une fenêtre de commande

trans-unit.source: Windows Explorer

seg-source.mrk: Windows Explorer

target.mrk: Windows Explorer

trans-unit.source: Restarts workstation

seg-source.mrk: Restarts workstation

target.mrk: Redémarre le poste de travail

trans-unit.source: Launches the Restore Wizard

seg-source.mrk: Launches the Restore Wizard

target.mrk: Lance l’assistant de restauration

trans-unit.source: The Restore Wizard displays. Enter the fully qualified name of the workstation server or the network address in the Select Server window.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Restore Wizard displays.
Enter the fully qualified name of the workstation server or the network address in the Select Server window.

target.mrk: Le Wizard de restauration <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s'affiche.
Entrez le nom complet du serveur de poste de travail ou l'adresse réseau dans la fenêtre Select Server.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Cross Restore Authentication password that corresponds to the password you set in settings  Modify Default Settings.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the Cross Restore Authentication password that corresponds to the password you set in settings  Modify Default Settings.

target.mrk: Saisissez le mot de passe d'authentification de restauration croisée qui correspond au mot de passe que vous avez défini dans les paramètres Modifier les paramètres par défaut.

trans-unit.source: The Cross Restore must be enabled on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: The Cross Restore must be enabled on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: La restauration croisée doit être activée sur le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: The list only displays workstations available for disaster recovery.

seg-source.mrk: The list only displays workstations available for disaster recovery.

target.mrk: La liste affiche uniquement les postes de travail pour lesquels la récupération de données est disponible.

trans-unit.source: Select the workstation to restore in the Select Cross Machine window.

seg-source.mrk: Select the workstation to restore in the Select Cross Machine window.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le poste de travail à restaurer dans la fenêtre Select Cross Machine.

trans-unit.source: Select the version of the file Bootstrap to restore.

seg-source.mrk: Select the version of the file Bootstrap to restore.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez la version du fichier Bootstrap à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: An error message displays if the saved machine’s firmware is different from the current one. In that case, the workstation recovery is not possible.

seg-source.mrk: An error message displays if the saved machine’s firmware is different from the current one.
In that case, the workstation recovery is not possible.

target.mrk: Un message d’erreur s’affiche si le firmware du poste de travail sauvegardé est différent de l’actuel.
Dans ce cas, la restauration du poste de travail n’est pas possible.

trans-unit.source: The Disk Layout Editor displays.

seg-source.mrk: The Disk Layout Editor displays.

target.mrk: L’éditeur de disque s’affiche.

trans-unit.source: The disks already on the restored workstation display in green.

seg-source.mrk: The disks already on the restored workstation display in green.

target.mrk: Les disques déjà présents sur le poste de travail restauré s'affichent en vert.

trans-unit.source: Data Recover Selection

seg-source.mrk: Data Recover Selection

target.mrk: Sélection des données à restaurer

trans-unit.source: Once you have configured the BMR, you then need to select the data (partitions or disk) you want to restore.

seg-source.mrk: Once you have configured the BMR, you then need to select the data (partitions or disk) you want to restore.

target.mrk: Une fois que vous avez configuré le BMR, vous devez ensuite sélectionner les données (partitions ou disque) que vous voulez restaurer.

trans-unit.source: To select the data to restore

seg-source.mrk: To select the data to restore

target.mrk: Sélectionner les données à restaurer

trans-unit.source: Use the Disk Layout Editor screen to select the disk (in black) and/or the partition of the disk (in blue) you want to restore.

seg-source.mrk: Use the Disk Layout Editor screen to select the disk (in black) and/or the partition of the disk (in blue) you want to restore.

target.mrk: Utilisez l’écran Disk Layout Editor pour sélectionner le disque (en noir) et/ou la partition du disque (en bleu) que vous voulez restaurer.

trans-unit.source: The Disk Layout Editor is made of two parts:

seg-source.mrk: The Disk Layout Editor is made of two parts:

target.mrk: Le Disk Layout Editor est composé de deux parties :

trans-unit.source: Backed up. This area does not correspond to backed up only data. It corresponds to the data layout. Pass your mouse over the area to display the partition detailed information:

seg-source.mrk: <span class="Lead-In">Backed up.
This area does not correspond to backed up only data.
It corresponds to the data layout.
Pass your mouse over the area to display the partition detailed information:

target.mrk: <span class="Lead-In">Backed up.
Cette zone ne correspond pas uniquement aux données sauvegardées.
Elle correspond également à l’organisation des données.
Passez votre souris sur la zone pour afficher les informations détaillées de la partition :

trans-unit.source: Partition ID

seg-source.mrk: Partition ID

target.mrk: Partition ID

trans-unit.source: Size

seg-source.mrk: Size

target.mrk: Taille

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

target.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: File system

seg-source.mrk: File system

target.mrk: Fichier système

trans-unit.source: FS Name

seg-source.mrk: FS Name

target.mrk: Nom FS

trans-unit.source: Current Partitioning. It corresponds to the area to which you drop the partition you want to restore from the Backed up area. You can modify (), delete, or create () a partition manually.

seg-source.mrk: Current Partitioning.
It corresponds to the area to which you drop the partition you want to restore from the Backed up area.
You can modify (), delete, or create () a partition manually.

target.mrk: Current Partitioning.
Correspond à la zone dans laquelle vous allez déposer, à partir de la zone Backed up, la partition que vous voulez restaurer.
Vous pouvez modifier (), supprimer ou créer ( ) une partition manuellement.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop the disk/partition from the Backed up area to the Current partitioning area.

seg-source.mrk: Drag and drop the disk/partition from the Backed up area to the Current partitioning area.

target.mrk: Faites glisser et déposez le disque /partition de la zone Backed up vers la zone Current partitioning.

trans-unit.source: If the target disk cannot fit with the given volume sizes, the volumes are automatically resized proportionally to their minimum required space.

seg-source.mrk: If the target disk cannot fit with the given volume sizes, the volumes are automatically resized proportionally to their minimum required space.

target.mrk: Si le disque cible ne peut pas s'adapter aux tailles de volumes données, les volumes sont automatiquement redimensionnés proportionnellement à l’espace minimum requis.

trans-unit.source: If the target disk size is larger, the size of volumes is automatically portioned proportionally to the actual size.

seg-source.mrk: If the target disk size is larger, the size of volumes is automatically portioned proportionally to the actual size.

target.mrk: Si la taille du disque cible est plus importante, la taille des volumes est répartie proportionnellement à celle du disque cible de façon automatique.

trans-unit.source: If you want to select and manage individually the partitions you want to restore, you need first to initialize the disk and then select the volume individually.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to select and manage individually the partitions you want to restore, you need first to initialize the disk and then select the volume individually.

target.mrk: Si vous voulez sélectionner et gérer individuellement les partitions que vous voulez restaurer, vous devez d'abord initialiser le disque, puis sélectionner le volume individuellement.

trans-unit.source: To initialize the disk.

seg-source.mrk: To initialize the disk.

target.mrk: Pour initialiser le disque.

trans-unit.source: Click . The Disk Editor displays.

seg-source.mrk: Click .
The Disk Editor displays.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur .
L’éditeur de disque s’affiche.

trans-unit.source: Select the partition type (either MBR or GPT).

seg-source.mrk: Select the partition type (either MBR or GPT).

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le type de partition (MBR ou GPT).

trans-unit.source: Click Apply.

seg-source.mrk: Click Apply.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Apply.

trans-unit.source: The procedure is then the same as the one to create, delete, or modify a partition.

seg-source.mrk: The procedure is then the same as the one to create, delete, or modify a partition.

target.mrk: La procédure est ensuite la même que celle utilisée pour créer, supprimer ou modifier une partition.

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh to update the Resulting partitioning view.

seg-source.mrk: Click Refresh to update the Resulting partitioning view.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Refresh pour rafraîchir la zone Resulting partitioning.

trans-unit.source: To modify or delete a partition.

seg-source.mrk: To modify or delete a partition.

target.mrk: Pour modifier ou supprimer une partition.

trans-unit.source: Click on the right top corner of the partition. The Partition Editor displays.

seg-source.mrk: Click on the right top corner of the partition.
The Partition Editor displays.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur en haut à droite de la partition.
Le Partition Editor s’affiche.

trans-unit.source: Select the Delete check box to delete the partition.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Delete check box to delete the partition.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez la case à cocher Delete pour supprimer la partition.

trans-unit.source: Set the Files system size.

seg-source.mrk: Set the Files system size.

target.mrk: Paramétrez la taille des fichiers système.

trans-unit.source: The available size depends on the available disk size.

seg-source.mrk: The available size depends on the available disk size.

target.mrk: Le choix de la taille dépend de la taille disponible du disque.

trans-unit.source: Click Apply.

seg-source.mrk: Click Apply.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Apply.

trans-unit.source: You cannot restore several times the same partition.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot restore several times the same partition.

target.mrk: Vous ne pouvez pas restaurer plusieurs fois la même partition.

trans-unit.source: Click Apply to start the restore process. The BMR Status screen displays with additional information on the restore process.

seg-source.mrk: Click Apply to start the restore process.
The BMR Status screen displays with additional information on the restore process.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Apply pour démarrer le processus de restauration.
L’écran BMR Status s’affiche avec des informations complémentaires sur le processus de restauration.

trans-unit.source: The restore duration depends on the amount of data to restore.

seg-source.mrk: The restore duration depends on the amount of data to restore.

target.mrk: La durée de restauration dépend de la quantité de données à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: You can select the Reboot upon completion of restore check box to automatically reboot the workstation after the restore.

seg-source.mrk: You can select the Reboot upon completion of restore check box to automatically reboot the workstation after the restore.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez sélectionner la case à cocher Reboot upon completion of restoration pour redémarrer automatiquement le poste de travail après le processus de restauration.

trans-unit.source: Additional Steps after Data Recovery

seg-source.mrk: Additional Steps after Data Recovery

target.mrk: Etapes supplémentaires après la restauration de données

trans-unit.source: Once the restore process is completed, a new laptop is identified as a new agent in the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: Once the restore process is completed, a new laptop is identified as a new agent in the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Une fois le processus de restauration terminé, un nouvel ordinateur portable est identifié comme un nouvel agent dans le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: If the server is configured to be auto created, the new agent name is by default agentname-00n.

seg-source.mrk: If the server is configured to be auto created, the new agent name is by default agentname-00n.

target.mrk: Si le serveur est configuré en création automatique, le nom du nouvel agent est par défaut agentname-00n.

trans-unit.source: If the server is not configured to be auto created, you need to rename the original agent (e.g., agentname-old) and create the new one.

seg-source.mrk: If the server is not configured to be auto created, you need to rename the original agent (e.g., agentname-old) and create the new one.

target.mrk: Si le serveur n'est pas configuré en création automatique, vous devez renommer l'agent d'origine (ex. agentname-old) et en créer un nouveau.
